Html:
Hello everyone,

With MCI it is possible to change time position while recording and overwrite or insert new recorded audio from mic.

Is it possible to do this with NAudio ? if yes, how can I do it ?

I need to write and read same audio, WaveIn and WaveOut to record some audio, rewind, listen, record again, ...

WaveIn just returns what the microphone hears. It is completely up to you what you want to do with it. You can save it to a WAV file and play it back, and insert new recorded audio in different positions within your WAV file.

Mark
